name: Hergrave
description:
Enter the abandoned school of Hergrave.
You heard static noise in the radio saying "Hergrave", you know it's an abandoned school near you, and you go investigate.
Soon finding out the horror living inside the building you decide to end it by burning the cursed items that summoned the monster ages ago.

Developed by Joni Ritvanen & Eetu Loisa, 1st year students at Kajaani University of Applied Sciences (KAMK), as our first ever game project. development time was around 2 months as was the courses too, moving onto new project soon.
